content: I'm at a conference, and Daniel Peralta Salas (who does PDEs) asked me if we have this theorem. This is a classical and very general result, whose proof is only a few pages long. Are we anywhere near a proof of this?

I remember @Yury G. Kudryashov giving a talk with a list of 21 major theorems, asking the audience which ones were not formalised yet. (The answer: only 5, one of which was Fermat.) Cauchy-Kovalevskaya is among the list of not formalised yet.
Was this the link you were thinking of?
It shouldn't be too hard to formalize it but it never made it to the top of my priority list.
